did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes correspondence, research projects, civil rights material, reports, fund raising material, programs, minutes of meetings, financial records, memoranda, press releases, newsletters, publications, correspondence and other material related to various Republican organizations, mailings to potential contributors and subscribers, membership records, research materials and papers, clippings, and other records of the Ripon Society. Also records of the Ripon Society collected by Howard F. Gillette, Jr.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, research projects, civil rights material, reports, fund raising material, programs, minutes of meetings, financial records, memoranda, press releases, newsletters, publications, correspondence and other material related to various Republican organizations, mailings to potential contributors and subscribers, membership records, research materials and papers, clippings, and other records of the Ripon Society. Also records of the Ripon Society collected by Howard F. Gillette, Jr.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: All additions to the collection except for publications and news releases are closed for 10 years from the date of arrival at Cornell - Boxes 31 to 53 closed until November 2019.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Ripon Society records, #2824. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
